Trade/Device Name(s): BD FACSCanto flow cytometer (4-3-3 configuration) with BD FACSCanto clinical software and BD FACSDiva software
BD FACSCanto II flow cytometers (4-2-2 and 5-3 configurations) with BD FACSCanto clinical software and BD FACSDiva software
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): BD FACSCanto II flow cytometer (4-2-2 configuration)
BD FACSCanto II flow cytometer (5-3 configuration)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD FACSCanto and FACSCanto II flow cytometers and software for identification and enumeration of human cell subsets using in vitro diagnostic assays.
Indications for Use Summary: For use with cleared or approved in vitro diagnostic assays indicated for identification and enumeration of human cell subsets; only six detection channels using blue and red lasers are cleared for IVD use; for use with or without BD FACS Sample Prep Assistant III.
